Rapid Tools for SharePoint is a set of developer tools that are dedicated to making SharePoint developers more productive.

  * Enables the entire Software Development lifecycle on the SharePoint platform. Build and deploy your project from source control to any environment with [SPDeploy] and the [Provisioning Provisioning Framework].
  * Enables isolated environments. You can choose to isolate your environments by developer and by use (such as test, qa, etc.)
